trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_SEQ_00<tab>Varshahn wears a look of quiet determination.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_TODO_00<tab>Gather information on the hydromantic terraces.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_TODO_01<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_TODO_02<tab>Search for the clever voidsent at carcere IV.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Wherever I turn, there's Darkness as far as I can perceive; the only source of Light here is ourselves. The opposite was true in the First.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>It seems the minions are content to gawp for now. Let's carry on.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_010<tab>The warding scale exhibits no change. It should be safe to remain here and begin our search.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_011<tab>But whither now? I would sense Azdaja were she remotely near, but there is nothing...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_012<tab>Might you not call to her? Let her know that you have come.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_013<tab>Alas, this vessel is not capable of calling across vast distances. For that, I require my true form.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_014<tab>And even were it possible, a dragon's call is borne upon aether. 'Tis liable to draw more voidsent to us.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_100_014<tab>I see...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>In any case, there's little exploration to be done while we are confined to this isolated isle.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_016<tab>I propose we begin by learning what we can from the castle's occupants. An understanding of their ways may prove useful to our cause.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_017<tab>Very well. Let's hope a few of them are capable of speech.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_018<tab>Let all remain vigilant while we go about our inquiries. We reconvene afterwards.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_100<tab>Like the prevailing tongue in Norvrandt, the language of this world bears a resemblance to our own. It may be assumed that they share a common ancestor.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_105<tab>This one does naught but stare...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_110<tab>Some seem willing enough to converse. Whether they have the ability to do so is another matter...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593A_000_120<tab>Grrrrrr...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593A_000_121<tab>Grrr? Grrraaargggh...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_SYSTEM_000_122<tab>The creature snarls and glares at you. It is unlikely that you will learn anything from it.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593A_000_125<tab>Grrr... Grrraaargggh!
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593B_000_130<tab>What enticing aether you have... Give me some! Give me some!
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593B_000_131<tab>Awww... If only I were stronger, I'd be able to eat you...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593B_000_132<tab>Fine, fine. I'll find someone else to eat... <grumble>
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_SYSTEM_000_133<tab>While able to communicate, this one seems to think only of feeding. Better to take your inquiries elsewhere.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593B_000_135<tab>I want to eat you. I mustn't eat you. I want to eat you. I mustn't eat you...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593C_000_140<tab>The mistress's eyes are beauteous! Sublime! To bask in her gaze is bliss!
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593C_000_141<tab>But now she's gone... Never again will I feel her gaze...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593C_000_142<tab>No mistress. No orders. What am I to do now? What am I to do now?
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_SYSTEM_000_143<tab>The creature mutters endlessly to itself, not sparing you so much as a glance.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593C_000_145<tab>No mistress. No orders. What am I to do now? What am I to do now?
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593D_000_150<tab>I serve! I obey! Please don't eat me!
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593D_000_151<tab>A...dragon? What's that? Does it taste good? I don't know anything about it. Don't know about anything.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593D_000_152<tab>But the one we caught recently, they seemed to know lots.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593D_000_153<tab>We threw them in the dungeon, but clever ones are tasty. They might have been eaten already.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_SYSTEM_000_154<tab>You've learned all you can from this voidsent. If you look in the dungeon, you may be able to find the clever one it mentioned.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VOIDSENT04593D_000_155<tab>We threw the clever one in the dungeon, but clever ones are tasty. If I had the chance, I don't think I could resist...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_200<tab>I have nothing to share. While those I approached had no will to fight, neither were they capable of holding a conversation worth the name.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_201<tab>My experience was much the same. Lower-rung voidsent tend to have lower intelligence, 'twould seem.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_202<tab>A pity Scarmiglione is dead. He was talkative at least.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_203<tab>What of you?
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_204<tab>A clever voidsent in the dungeon...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_205<tab>That would be the area in which we emerged.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_206<tab>Indeed.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_207<tab>Let's take ourselves back there and find this voidsent─preferably before its fellows make a meal of it.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_208<tab>To the dungeon, then.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_300<tab>There appears to be someone within...
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_305<tab>I mislike the feel of this. Stay on your guard.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_310<tab>Could this be the clever voidsent?
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_400<tab>Zenos's avatar, eh? What are the odds.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_ESTINIEN_000_405<tab>We still know little about her, but for now I'm glad we found someone who can do more than moan for aether.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_410<tab>I assume the dungeon was reserved for those intended for the mistress's consumption.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_VARSHAHN_000_415<tab>'Tis fortunate that we came here when we did. Fateful, even.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_420<tab>When I served Zenos, my mind was shrouded in haze. But one thing was always clear─his obsession with the “friend.”
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_425<tab>What the word means, I do not know exactly. I know only that it referred to you, and that yours was an important existence.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_430<tab>As much as one might expect the unexpected, I doubt any of us could have foreseen this turn of events.

TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_431<tab>She seems different from other voidsent─at least those we've met. And the change we witnessed, I suspect, is due to your crystal purging the excess Darkness in her.
TEXT_AKTKMI102_04593_YSHTOLA_000_432<tab>Even so, she still harbors a great deal of Darkness. I'm very keen to hear what she can tell us─about herself and about her world.
